Plot: A psychopathic Japanese executive accidentally triggers a journalist's 'dark side'. They begin to connect over the Internet and make a complicated bond.
Title: Killers
Writer: Takuji Ushiyama (original story), Takuji Ushiyama, Timo Tjahjanto (story and screenplay), Timo Tjahjanto
Actors: Kazuki Kitamura, Oka Antara, Rin Takanashi, Luna Maya
